title: Dorothy in a Black Dress
inscriptions: u.l. in oil: FKnight `53; verso u.l. in pencil: 6 Schustor[?]; verso u.c. in pencil: F KNIGHT; verso u.c. in ink: "DOROTHY IN A BLACK DRESS" FREDERIC KNIGHT; verso u.l. on sticker: 26; verso u.l. in ink: FK/ 12/12/61; verso c.l. in pencil: C-7438 [in square] "OCTOBER STILL LIFE"    KNIGHT; verso u.c. in chalk: [illegible]; verso c. in chalk: 23 [upside down]; verso c.r. in pencil: 36; verso c.r. stamped: 36 ANCO.INC.
